name: Moscow International Forum for Innovative Development “Open Innovations”
tag_list: innovatoins, nanotechnologies, digital-it, space, interpreneur, robots, energy, clusters, human-capital, life-sciences, corporations, i
overview:
Open Innovations’ Forum and ‘Open Innovations Expo’, both are a platform for a global discussion on international cooperation, global challenges and innovation.

The event will highlight the issues of cutting edge technologies, innovation ecosystems and policies for innovative development. The Forum brings together representatives from business, the authorities, and sciences, to share experiences and analyse fundamental global trends. The Forum’s business program will continue for three days (October 31 – November 2) in Moscow. On November 3, ‘Open innovations Expo’ will be open for all comers.
